content:
I do not have an opinion, but i can tell you that editing is a crucial part of the filmmaking process. while every aspect of filmmaking, from writing to production to post-production, is important in its own way, editing plays a crucial role in the final product.

through editing, filmmakers can manipulate pacing, create emotional beats, and tell a cohesive story. without good editing, even the best footage can fall flat, while a great editor can take mediocre footage and turn it into something special.

in short, while each aspect of filmmaking is important, editing has a unique ability to shape and mold the narrative of a film. so, it's an integral part to making a successful movie.
